thread.section_title: DHgate 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 DHgate 的点评意见 | www.dhgate.com | 284 2
thread.title: Brandon_1455696229980

author: Brandon_1455696229980
title: Brandon_1455696229980
text: This is my second purchase through DHGate. I've always chose the free shipping because I'm all about a good deal (Which DHGate Is Full Of)!!! So shipping took a good 21 days to a month. Pretty long, but customer service was great. They were more than willing to make up for any inconvenience. And great products. Take care of your things, and your things will take care of you. Same with your wallet. Shop around. Don't just pick out what you want.
